title: Useful Links
description: Links that users may find useful and relevant to their studies in Ottawa

id.description: Unique identifier for the category of links

image.description: Path for the image which represents the category and its subcategories

links.description: A list of links in the category

items.description: A link display name and URL

invalid.description: Indicates a link which is no longer valid and should be updated before being displayed

^name(_[a-z]+)?$.description: Name of the link. Add the locale modifier for names in different languages

^link(_[a-z]+)?$.description: URL of the link. Add the locale modifier for URLs in different languages

social.description: A list of social media links

items.description: A social media platform and link

invalid.description: Indicates a link which is no longer valid and should be updated before being displayed

^name(_[a-z]+)?$.description: Name of the social media platform. Add the locale modifier for names in different languages

^link(_[a-z]+)?$.description: URL of the link. Add the locale modifier for URLs in different languages

^name(_[a-z]+)?$.description: Name of the category. Add the locale modifier for names in different languages
